entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low plus 2 except minus 2 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2 except minus 2 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 8 except 12 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8 except 12 north of Cape Ray. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023
